show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #80 Macauley Kincaid "The Frog Donkey Horn"
subtitle: #80 Macauley Kincaid "The Frog Donkey Horn"
summary:
My friend Mac joins CK and I on zoom to give us an update on what weird things he's tried since we last caught up. We talk about something that's on a lot of our minds, drought. Mac talks about how he has mitigated his drought risk and recaps a field day back in May with our mutual friend, Ray Archuleta.
We talk about measuring biomass, lessons from this years failures and he shares some tips on grazing math and how to figure paddock sizes.
